About the job
            

                  
      
    

  
      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn More
  

            
                
                  As a Senior Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer at our startup, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the delivery of high-quality software products to our customers. In addition to technical expertise, you will need excellent communication and leadership skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and manage people effectively.Responsibilities      Develop and implement comprehensive test strategies, plans, and test cases for our backend, frontend, and Android applications.Conduct thorough testing and identify bugs, defects, and performance issues in our software products.Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand user needs and project requirements.Prioritize and manage multiple testing tasks efficiently, while ensuring high-quality and timely delivery of software releases.Perform root cause analysis (RCA) for any reported bugs and work towards avoiding similar issues in future releases.Provide leadership and guidance to junior QA team members, mentor them, and assist in their professional development.Continuously explore and implement industry best practices, tools, and techniques to improve the overall QA process.Collaborate closely with the development team to enhance the software development lifecycle and promote a quality-first mindset.Document and communicate test results, progress, and any potential risks or issues to stakeholders.
Requirements      We are on the course of building a team of the smartest people, who are driven by a purpose and want to work in a fast-paced environment. An ideal candidate for this role is someone who has:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.3 - 4 years of experience in QA/testing roles, preferably in a software development environment.Strong proficiency in testing backend, frontend, and Android applications.In-depth knowledge of testing methodologies, tools, and techniques.Proven experience in designing and writing test cases that cover functional, integration, and regression testing.Ability to understand user needs, prioritize tasks, and manage resources effectively.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with keen attention to detail.Solid understanding of software development processes and the ability to work closely with developers to ensure high-quality releases.Experience with bug-tracking systems and test management tools.Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently with minimal supervision.Experience with test automation frameworks and tools.Familiarity with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) processes.Knowledge of performance testing and security testing methodologies.You can apply first principles while solving real-time problems.You want to work with some of the most energetic and creative minds in the industry.You have the hunger to learn and grow quickly.You want to be an integral part of building the best neighborhood retail chain in India.You want to have fun while building ApnaMart.
This job was posted by Chetan Garg from Apna Mart.
                
                
                Desired Skills and Experience
                
                  Automation Testing,Manual Testing,Mobile Apps Testing,Performance Testing,SDET,Security Testing,JavaScript,JMeter,Python

About the job
            

            
                
                        Extensive experience in manual testing, test case development, and execution.  Good experience in testing ArcGIS based applications  Strong SQL skills for database testing and data validation.  Experience in defect management and reporting processes using JIRA.  Familiarity with test management tools in JIRA and Agile development methodologies.  Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills.  Proficiency in automation testing with Playwright – NICE to have  Strong communication and collaboration abilities, with the capacity to influence cross-functional teams.

About the job
            

                  
      
    

  
      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn More
  

            
                
                  We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products by designing and executing comprehensive test plans. If you are passionate about delivering high-quality software and possess expertise in REST, Selenium, Appium, Protractor, Mocha, Chai, JMeter, and have experience with Flutter intergration_test, Jasmine, and Junit, we want to hear from you.Responsibilities      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and software specifications.Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts for web and mobile applications.Conduct thorough functional, regression, and performance testing.Identify, document, and track software defects and work with developers to resolve issues.Participate in test automation efforts using Selenium, Appium, Protractor, Mocha, Chai, JMeter, and other relevant tools.Perform API testing using RESTful APIs.Implement and maintain automated test suites.Utilize Flutter integration test for mobile application testing (a plus).Create and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test reports.Perform ad-hoc testing as necessary to support the software development process.Collaborate with developers to ensure software quality throughout the development lifecycle.Stay up-to-date with industry best practices and emerging QA technologies.Contribute to a culture of continuous improvement within the QA team.
Requirements      Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).Proven experience as a QA Engineer with expertise in testing web and mobile applications.Proficiency in test automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, Protractor, Mocha, and Chai.Experience with API testing using RESTful APIs.Familiarity with performance testing tools like JMeter.Knowledge of mobile testing, especially the Flutter integration test (a plus).Familiarity with test frameworks such as Jasmine and Junit.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, agile development environment.
This job was posted by Arnab Kumar Das from Thriving Springs.
                
                
                Desired Skills and Experience
                
                  Appium,Automation Testing,Big Data,Cypress,JMeter,JavaScript,Manual Testing,Mobile Apps Testing,Performance Testing,Perl,Python,QTP,Ruby,SDET,Security Testing,Selenium

About the job
            

            
                
                  Job Summary:We're seeking an experienced QA Automation Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills, excellent communication, and a proactive approach to issue resolution. The QA Automation Engineer will design, develop, and maintain automated testing solutions to ensure the quality and reliability of our software applications.Key Responsibilities:- Design, develop, and maintain automated testing frameworks using Python (Pytest)- Create and execute automated test scripts to ensure thorough coverage of application functionality- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize testing needs- Proactively identify and report issues, risks, and opportunities for process improvement- Work independently with minimal supervision, taking ownership of tasks and deliverables- Develop and maintain pipelines, integrating automated testing into CI/CD workflows- Apply OOPS concepts, code reusability principles, and fuzzy logic to write efficient, modular code- Analyze application flows and functionalities to identify potential issues and improve test coverageRequirements:- 3-4 years of experience in automation testing- Proficient in Python (2-3 years) with expertise in Pytest- Strong understanding of pipelines and ability to make required changes or learn quickly- Excellent communication and collaboration skills- Ability to work independently with minimal supervision- Proactive approach to issue identification and risk management- Strong grasp of OOPS concepts, code reusability, and fuzzy logic

column2: Quality Assurance Testing Engineer - Banking Domain
column9:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Quality Assurance Testing Engineer Job Description:We are seeking a skilled Quality Assurance Testing Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in Java, API Testing with Karate Framework, and cloud-based application testing (preferably AWS). Experience in the banking domain is a plus. The QA Engineer will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of software applications by designing, executing, and automating test cases.Key Responsibilities:      Develop, execute, and maintain automated and manual test scripts using Karate Framework for API testing.Collaborate with developers and stakeholders to ensure test coverage and software quality.Conduct functional, regression, performance, and integration testing.Work with cloud-based applications, preferably AWS, to test application functionality in cloud environments.Identify, document, and track software defects using industry-standard bug tracking tools.Ensure adherence to QA best practices and software development lifecycle (SDLC) processes.Work in Agile/Scrum teams, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning.Provide test reports and recommendations based on test results.
Required Qualifications:      Hands-on experience in Java for test automation.Strong expertise in API testing using Karate Framework.Experience in cloud-based application testing (preferably AWS).Familiarity with RESTful APIs, Postman, and other API testing tools.Good understanding of test automation frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.Experience with JIRA, TestRail, or similar test management tools.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Preferred Qualifications:      Banking domain experience with knowledge of financial applications and workflows.Exposure to performance testing tools such as JMeter.Experience in containerized environments (Docker, Kubernetes).

About the job
            

            
                
                  Job TitleQA Automation Engineer at Pibit, based out of Bengaluru - On-site RoleCompany DetailsPibit, based in Palo Alto, California, specializes in transforming loss run files into detailed reports with actionable insights, enabling carriers and MGAs to boost underwriting efficiency and make more informed decisions.Job Roles & Responsibilities→ Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Selenium and REST Assured to ensure software quality.→ Collaborate with development teams to integrate test scripts into Jenkins CI/CD pipelines.→ Analyze test results, identify issues, and work with the development team to resolve bugs.→ Ensure that applications align with business requirements by working closely with the product team.→ Improve test processes and expand test coverage through effective use of automation.→ Report and track software defects, providing detailed bug reports and regression testing as needed.→ Mentor junior QA engineers to enhance team capabilities and best practices.Cultural Expectations→ Collaborate cross-functionally to innovate and deliver high-quality testing solutions.→ Embrace a proactive mindset with a focus on continuous improvement.→ Share knowledge and mentor peers to foster team growth.→ Communicate transparently to drive clarity and efficiency.Hiring Process→ Profile shortlisting→ Tech interview→ Tech interview→ General culture fit

About the job
            

            
                
                  Who we areBorn in 2014, Yoti is a digital identity and biometric technology company that makes it safer for people to prove who they are. The Yoti app was designed with privacy at its core, giving people a secure way to prove their identity and share third-party credentials with organisations and other people.Today, we have over ten million app downloads around the world. We’ve expanded our offering to a suite of business solutions that span identity verification, age verification and estimation, e-signing, AI anti-spoofing technologies and we continue to think of innovative new offerings.From day one, we’ve been working to fix an outdated identity system. This is not a journey we make on our own but with policy advisors, think tanks, researchers, academics, humanitarian bodies, our users and everyday people. We are committed to solving identity problems through grassroots research and social purpose initiatives.About the Role:We are looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) to join the QA team at Yoti. In this role, you will be working on our web-based projects and will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining automated test frameworks, ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our applications. You will collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and QA engineers to uphold and enhance software quality throughout the development lifecycle.Key Responsibilities:      Develop and maintain automated test frameworks, tools, and test scripts for functional, non-functional, and regression testing.Design and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts to validate software functionality and performance.Identify, document, and track defects, collaborating with developers to ensure timely resolution.Integrate automated testing solutions, leveraging Concourse CI/CD pipelines for efficient workflow orchestration and deployment automation.Perform API, UI, and database testing to validate system functionality and data integrity.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define quality metrics and ensure best practices in test automation.Investigate, analyse, and improve existing test coverage and frameworks.Keep up to date with industry trends, tools, and best practices in test automation and software quality assurance.
Required Skills & Experience:      4+ years of experience in software testing and automation development.Strong programming skills in JavaScript and Python, with Go being a valuable advantage.Experience with some of the following test automation frameworks including Selenium, WDIO, Mocha, PyTest, Behave, GoMock, and TestifyProficiency in API testing tools like Postman, RestAssured, or similar.Experience with containerisation technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, including orchestration, deployment strategies, and performance optimisation.Knowledge of performance and security testing methodologies.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.Ability to communicate and collaborate with team members and other stakeholders.
Desired Skills and Experience:      Familiarity with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, Git actions or ConcourseExperience with containerisation technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, including orchestration, deployment strategies, and performance optimisation.Knowledge of performance and security testing methodologies desired but not essential.Experience with Behaviour Driven Development (BDD) using CucumberUnderstanding of test data management and mocking techniques.Exposure to contract testing with Pact or similar tools, not required but a bonus.
What’s in it for you?      Medical Insurance cover of INR 5 lakhsLife Insurance / Accidental coverGratuity as per lawPF as per law18 days paid leave + 6 sick day leave (Yearly)10 declared holidays (Yearly)5 fully paid Selfie Days - for your own personal development, volunteering, charity events, etcQuarterly Team and company activities, Social clubs.Continuous learning opportunities (Annual Training budgets, conferences etc)
This is a great opportunity to join a company that is leading the way for innovative and responsible identity verification. We’re looking for people who can adapt to a fast-paced environment, as well as champion our brand and what we stand for. We value a positive attitude and people who have a collaborative, creative and transparent approach to solving problems.We believe in equal opportunitiesIt takes a diverse community of passionate, talented and committed people to build a simpler, more secure way of proving identity. We’re an equal opportunity employer, so we welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, with different outlooks and experiences.Talent PoolIf we consider that you might be suitable for other roles in the future, we will keep your details so we can contact you about these other roles. If you do not want us to keep your details for this purpose, please e-mail peopleteam@yoti.com or let us know at any stage of the recruitment process. For more information please read our Applicant Privacy Notice.

About the job
            

            
                
                  Hi All,We are hiring -ETL Tester /Lead Hiring is combination of Data Functional and Automation skills with 5.5 to 12 Years exp level. About the job
            

            
                
                  Qualifications:      Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Proven experience as an SDET or in a similar role, preferably in a product company.Proficient in programming languages such as Java, C#, or Python, and experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG).Solid understanding of software development processes, testing methodologies, and agile development practices.Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.Proficiency in SQL and working knowledge of relational databases and non relational databasesFamiliarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and defect tracking tools.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within cross-functional teams.Self-motivated, proactive, and capable of working independently with minimal supervisionKnowledge of cloud platforms and services, such as GCP, AWS or Azure.
Responsibilities:      Develop and maintain automated test frameworks, tools, and test scripts to ensure efficient and effective test execution.Collaborate with software developers and product managers to understand product requirements and design comprehensive test plans and strategies.Implement and execute automated tests to validate the functionality, performance, and scalability of our software products.Continuously monitor and analyze test results to identify defects, troubleshoot issues, and drive resolution.

About the job
            

            
                
                  Experience: 5-8YearsLocation: BangaloreMandatory Skill: Java, Selenium, BDD Cucumber, Rest API and Rest Assured. Good in Backend Automation Experience using Rest Assured.Experience should be above 5+ years

About the job
            

            
                
                  Job Description :  TELUS Digital has been a global leader in data services since 2005. Listed on Feb 21 on the NYSE, TELUS Digital now has a market cap of $3Billion+. With Playment’s acquisition on July 21, we now have a combined strength in video, images, and audio text labelling, serving the world’s top ML teams. We’ve built a truly industry-agnostic platform to support the growing needs of our customers. Eg of our customer use cases - Automotive companies build self-driving capabilities, Agriculture companies for identify weeds & and fruit picking, Insurance companies for claim processing & and damage detection, Retail companies for shelf tracking, Drone/Satellite imagery for terrain analysis, E-commerce for cataloguing & and visual object understanding etc. Why is it important?  High-quality training data is the most crucial building block of ML, AI, and GenAI algorithms that are shaping tech advancements today. Enterprises adopting AI spend a considerable amount of their time in pre- and post-processing this data and require a combination of sophisticated tools supporting multiple data types, as well as a skilled and diverse workforce to ensure high-quality labelled data.  Since quality training data is the first step in quality AI solutions, our AI Data platforms and solutions are designed to cover end-to-end requirements for customers - from collection, selection, annotation, and even advanced GenAI tasks. Our global AI community of 1M+ contributors also helps companies test and improve AI and ML models, with wide subject matter expertise across data types, languages, geographies, and cultural contexts - enabling smarter products, better customer solutions, and so much more. This helps our customers focus on business outcomes instead of advanced AIOps. Role Description We are looking for SDET - II who can ensure the quality of our product through manual and automation testing. His/ her main responsibility is to ensure high-quality products through his/ her software testing. He/she should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, an understanding of software development and testing processes, excellent communication skills, and an eye for detail. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, we’d like to meet you. Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications, and systems work efficiently. Responsibilities: ● Develop and maintain automated test scripts for Web and API automation using Cypress and Playwright with TypeScript/JavaScript. ● Implement and enhance test suites using Selenium and RestAssured with Java. ● Build and execute automated mobile tests using Appium for both iOS and Android platforms. ● Database testing using SQL & NoSQL like MongoDB/PostgreSQL. ● Design and create robust automation frameworks from scratch, ensuring modularity, reusability, and scalability across modules/teams. ● Integrate test automation into the CI/CD pipeline. ● Participate in code reviews, providing feedback on the quality and testability of code. ● Mentor and provide technical guidance to junior team members and ensure best practices are followed in test automation. ● Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment, from requirement analysis to deployment. Requirements: ● Experience: 3-5 years in test automation with hands-on expertise in Cypress/Playwright, Selenium, Appium ● Frameworks: Proven track record in designing and implementing custom test automation frameworks. ● Languages: Proficient in TypeScript/JavaScript and Java. ● Mobile Automation: Experience with Appium for iOS and Android automation. ● API Testing: Proficient in API testing using tools like Rest Assured etc. ● Databases: Experience in working with MongoDB and PostgreSQL for database testing and validation. ● CI/CD: Proficiency with Jenkins and integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for continuous testing and deployment. Nice to have: ● Hands-on experience in JMeter, Grafana. ● Familiar with AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Node.js etc. ● Experience in enabling in-sprint automation for functional and non-functional testing. Benefits : 1. Work with a world-class team working on a very forward-looking problem 2. Competitive Pay 3. Flat hierarchy 4. Health insurance for the family

About the job
            

            
                
                  At ZoomInfo, we encourage creativity, value innovation, demand teamwork, expect accountability and cherish results. We value your take charge, take initiative, get stuff done attitude and will help you unlock your growth potential. One great choice can change everything. Thrive with us at ZoomInfo. General Function/Role Purpose:The Senior SDET in the core infra team is responsible for developing automation infrastructure and leveraging their knowledge and experience in improving the infrastructure design, promoting best practices, introducing stability and velocity improvements strategies, testability, and other advanced quality concepts across products. The main purpose of this role is to work on developing automation infrastructure for the quality and Dev engineers for enabling better automation testing.What You'll do:      Define, implement, and maintain automated infrastructure components.Demonstrate exceptional ability to isolate and troubleshoot technical issues across the full technology stack by leveraging software development methodologies.Work directly with Quality and Engineering teams to identify and exercise coding standards that allow Quality Engineering to maintain robust automation.Collaborate with other Quality Automation Engineers on major initiatives, mentoring and support.Contribute both to the definition and the enforcement of quality engineering processes and procedures based on best practice methodology.Proactively learn new shift left and AI related technology trends that will impact infrastructure and testing.Performs other duties as required/assigned by manager.
What you bring:      Around 7+ years of overall experience.Extensive experience (over 5 years) in Quality Automation Engineering.Experience developing test automation frameworks for 2+ years.Familiarity with Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) and Application Development Lifecycle.Familiar with Automation frameworks like Playwright, Pact, cypress.Working experience with CI-CD tools - Git Actions, Jenkins, Docker, Helm.BE experience developing microservices - big advantage.Familiarity with cloud-based infrastructure.Ability to work independently and within a team.Detail-oriented and well-organized.
  About us: ZoomInfo (NASDAQ: ZI) is the trusted go-to-market platform for businesses to find, acquire, and grow their customers. It delivers accurate, real-time data, insights, and technology to more than 35,000 companies worldwide. Businesses use ZoomInfo to increase efficiency, consolidate technology stacks, and align their sales and marketing teams — all in one platform. ZoomInfo may use a software-based assessment as part of the recruitment process. More information about this tool, including the results of the most recent bias audit, is available here.ZoomInfo is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, hiring based on qualifications, merit, and business needs, and does not discriminate based on protected status. We welcome all applicants and are committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of sex, race, age, color, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, disability status, religion, protected military or veteran status, medical condition, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We also consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in accordance with legal requirements.

About the job
            

            
                
                  We are seeking a highly experienced and visionary QA Automation Architect to lead the design, development, and implementation of a state-of-the-art automation framework. This role requires a strategic thinker and hands-on leader who can define and execute a robust automation strategy while collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the delivery of high-quality software solutions.Key Responsibilities:      Automation Framework Design and Development:
      Architect and build a scalable, maintainable, and robust automation framework from the ground up using the latest tools and technologies.Define and implement best practices for test automation, including coding standards, test design, and execution strategies.Ensure the framework supports functional, regression, performance, and integration testing.
      End-to-End Solution Delivery:
      Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into testable solutions.Design and implement end-to-end testing strategies to validate complex workflows and integrations across systems.Ensure seamless integration of the automation framework with CI/CD pipelines for continuous testing.
      Leadership and Mentorship:
      Provide technical leadership and guidance to QA engineers and developers on automation best practices.Mentor and upskill team members to enhance their technical expertise and ensure consistent delivery of high-quality work.Drive a culture of quality, innovation, and continuous improvement within the QA team.
      Tool and Technology Evaluation:
      Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in test automation tools and technologies.Evaluate and recommend tools, libraries, and frameworks that align with the organization's needs and goals.Ensure the selected tools integrate effectively with the existing technology stack.
      Quality Assurance Strategy:
      Define and implement a comprehensive QA strategy that includes both manual and automated testing approaches.Establish metrics and KPIs to measure the effectiveness of the QA process and drive continuous improvement.Identify and mitigate risks related to quality and testing.
      Collaboration and Communication:
      Work closely with development, DevOps, and product teams to ensure alignment on quality goals and deliverables.Communicate progress, challenges, and results to stakeholders at all levels of the organization.Act as a subject matter expert for QA automation and advocate for quality across the organization.
Required Skills and Qualifications:      Experience:12 to 15 years of experience in QA, with at least 4+ years in a QA Architect or similar leadership role.Proven experience in designing and implementing automation frameworks from scratch.Hands-on experience with end-to-end testing of complex systems and integrations.Technical Skills:Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript.Expertise in automation tools and frameworks like Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Playwright, or similar.Experience with API testing tools like Postman, Rest Assured, or similar.Strong knowledge of CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, Azure DevOps) and integrating automation into pipelines.Familiarity with performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, Gatling) is a plus.Solid understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies.Soft Skills:Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities.
